definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: Ec Ec 7:7 oppression, extortion;—´[[ע]] abs. Je 6:6 +, cstr. Ps 119:134, Ec 5:7; —
Je 6:6, Je 22:17, Ez Eze 22:7, Eze 22:12, Ps 73:8; c. genit. subj. Ps 119:134, obj. Ec 5:7; as acc. cogn. c. [[עָשַׁק]] (q. v.) Ez Eze 18:18, Eze 22:29.
concr., gain of extortion. Ps 62:11, so perh. Ec 7:7; as acc. cogn. Le 5:23 (‖[[גׇּזֵל]]).—Is 30:12, Is 59:13 rd. [[עִקֵּשׁ]] Lag Gr al.
